desc: Hello, dear observer. We are pleased to see you on our site. Our education center has the following courses. Learn from us. Get 100% of the exams in each of our courses and get 1 month of free education. If you solve 90% and above, we will give you a monthly discount of 50%. If you want to study, register below and we will contact you personally. Good luck with your studies!!!

spc_txt: This is our programming course. It lasts 5 months. Our teacher is one of the programmers who graduated from the MediaTech It School training center in Tashkent and got a certificate. Click to learn more!
frnt_txt: This programmer is one of the students who graduated from the MediaTech It School education center in Tashkent. Now he has opened a course to share his knowledge. Here is her certificate.
rqs_3: Spend as much time as possible per day
